flavor_text_entries.black:
These mysterious Pokémon evolve when
they receive electrical stimulation while
they are in the same place as Shelmet.
flavor_text_entries.white:
When they feel threatened, they spit
an acidic liquid to drive attackers away.
This Pokémon targets Shelmet.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
For some reason they evolve when
they receive electrical energy while
they are attacking Shelmet.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
For some reason they evolve when
they receive electrical energy while
they are attacking Shelmet.
flavor_text_entries.x:
These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they
receive electrical stimulation while they are in the
same place as Shelmet.
flavor_text_entries.y:
For some reason they evolve when they receive
electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they
receive electrical stimulation while they are in the
same place as Shelmet.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
For some reason they evolve when they receive
electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
Its strange physiology reacts to electrical energy
in interesting ways. The presence of a Shelmet
will cause this Pokémon to evolve.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
It spits a liquid from its mouth to melt through
Shelmet’s shell. Karrablast doesn’t eat the shell—
it eats only the contents.
